title: Machi Open The Bottle Lyrics Mankatha Song Lyrics
singerName: Haricharan, Mano, Naveen Madhav, Premgi Amaren, Tipu
stanzas:
Singer: Mano, Premgi Amaran,
Tippu, Haricharan, Naveen
Song: Machi Open The Bottle
Lyrics: Vaali
Music Director: Yuvan Shankar Raja

Machi Open The Bottle

Idhu Ambaani parambarai, anjaru thalamura
Aandham valarpira thaan
Naama kottu-nu oru mura
sonnaka palamura, kottaadho panamazhai thaan

Naama munnerum padikettu
Nam vazhvil cricket-u
Ippo onbadhu girahamum onnaga irukku
Oh ho-nu nam jaathagam

Aadama jaichomada, nam maeni vaadama jaichomada
Oadama run eduthom, summave otkaanthu win eduthom

Idhu Ambaani parambarai, anjaru thalamura
Aandham valarpira thaan
Naama kottu-nu oru mura
sonnaka palamura, kottaadho panamazhai thaan

Hey ..onna renda aasa unna kanda
Jillunu nikkira jigirdhanda.
Thappu Thanda seiya oppukonda
Poo mela kondhuven soala vanda

7zhu malai irukum kadavulukkum
Kaasu thaevaina panam kodupom,
Andha kuberan, aavaan kuselan
Namma proeperty munnaala single tea endraagm
andha sorgathin sothukkal thaan

Hey..ullaara verkaadu,
unnaala undaachu nokkaadu
Podendi sappaadu,
thottaaka podaadha koopaadu

Raman aandaalu, raavana aandaalu
ennakoru kavalai illa
hey naanthaan da, en mansaku raaja
vaangungada ye thangathil kooja
naana ketta keetatha kodupen
ketkura varangala ketukada

Ye thozha meena vazha neer venum
Naan vazha beer venum ne konjam oothu oothu
Thozha ippodhum eppodhum muppodhum
Veesidum nam pakkam kaathu kaathu
aathu kaalathil thoothikuven
Kaala nerathi maathikuven
Botha aanaalum, meeri ponaalum
Paatha oru naalum en kaalgal maarathu

Empaattu verathaan, ennaalum enrootu verathaan
Ennoda velathaan, ennaanu oorpesum naalaithaan

Idhu Ambaani parambarai, anjaru thalamura
Aandham valarpira thaan
Naama kottu-nu oru mura
sonnaka palamura, kottaadho panamazhai thaan

Naama munnerum padikettu
Nam vazhvil cricket-u
Ippo onbadhu girahamum onnaga irukku
Oh ho-nu nam jaathagam
